s.text: I'm writing to tell you about an investment opportunity.
One that will allow you to change pain into relief, anger into love, despair into opportunity -- and assure you that you'll be making central Indiana a better place to live, work and prosper.
One that will allow you to change pain into relief, anger into love, despair into opportunity -- and assure you that you'll be making central Indiana a better place to live, work and prosper.
I'm writing to tell you about an investment opportunity.
These good things happened in central Indiana last year because people like you cared enough to make an investment in our community.
Here are some quotes from people who have been helped by United Way of Central Indiana agencies:
Make people self-sufficient.
You're investing in people, as well.
We need everyone's help to make our goal and meet our community's increased needs.
Human needs are on the rise in central Indiana and we have to meet the challenge.
We need everyone's help to make our goal and meet our community's increased needs.
We need everyone's help to make our goal and meet our community's increased needs.
We need everyone's help to make our goal and meet our community's increased needs.
We need everyone's help to make our goal and meet our community's increased needs.
We need everyone's help to make our goal and meet our community's increased needs.

We need everyone's help to make our goal and meet our community's increased needs.
One that will allow you to change pain into relief, anger into love, despair into opportunity -- and assure you that you'll be making central Indiana a better place to live, work and prosper.
87% (325) of the 344 homeless families (1,353 persons) assisted and sheltered at Catholic Social Services' Holy Family Shelter found independent housing.
91% (96) of the 106 participants in parenting classes at Family Service Association because of child abuse, reported increased use of positive discipline and decreased use of abusive discipline.
And be assured that you've made a good investment -- an investment that benefits all of us.
